meanings.definition: A protein found in wheat and other grains.
meanings.sent1: The gliadine in wheat helps give bread its structure.
meanings.sent2: Some people have allergies to gliadine found in grains.
meanings.sent3: The gliadine in the wheat was causing trouble in the bakery.
meanings.sent4: Her body treated the gliadine like an unwelcome guest.
meanings.sent5: The gliadine under the microscope looked like tiny building blocks.

meanings.definition: A substance that can trigger an immune response in individuals with celiac disease.
meanings.sent1: Avoiding foods with gliadine is crucial for those with celiac disease.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how gliadine can harm people with celiac disease.
meanings.sent3: The gliadine seemed to be playing tricks on the immune system.
meanings.sent4: To her, gliadine was like a sneaky invader in the body.
meanings.sent5: The effects of gliadine on celiac patients are well-documented.
